name: Preserve Integrity
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
You spatially seal off a 60 foot radius area centered on target point within range. Space and Summoning spells of equal or lower tier in the same area can't be cast. Summoned creatures can't enter the area and are immediately expelled. Creature corpses inside the area can't be reanimated.

You can cast this spell over the course of 15 minutes. If you do so, the MP cost is halved.
